overview: 1950s Bumpkin  1960s smiley cutie with braids & a long necklace  1950s attractive brunette poses on a bed  1950s lovely slender blonde with long wavy hair, poses with a motorcycle!  1950s pretty brunette housewife type dances to the radio  1960s slutty looking dark-blonde on a sectional  1960s platinum bouffant blonde sex kitten  1950s classy brunette wears a shawl and white gloves  1960s beehive blonde with a black headband writhes around  1960s cuddly tousled blonde on a bed  1960s pleasantly pouty auburn-tressed lass  1960s elegant dark-haired doll on a couch  1960s gorgeous blonde bombshell on a flowered spread  1960s trashy blonde flashes on floor cushions
tagline: From the Golden Age of the Girlie Peep Show!
title: Nudie Cuties: Volume 70
